text:
RELIGION

Arulmigu Kamalavalli Nachiyar Temple, Woraiyur : Theppam festival, Thayar purappadu from sanctum sanctorum, 5.30 p.m.; theerthavari, 6 p.m.; thirumanjanam, 6.30 p.m.; purappadu from the theppam mandapam in pallakku, 8.45 p.m.; reaching sanctum sanctorum, 10.15 p.m.

Sri Srinivasa Perumal Temple, BHEL Township : Brahmotsavam, pallakku, Sri Krishnar thirukolam, 6 a.m.; Sesha vaganam, 7 p.m.

Sri Vishnu Sahasranama Parayana Sabha : Parayana goshti procession, South Gate, Srirangam, 5.30 a.m.; Sahasranama parayanam, Sri Sudarsan Garden, Melur Road, Srirangam, 6 p.m.

Sri Rama Nama Sath Sangam: Sri Rama Nama parayanam, Sri Perumal Temple, Indira Nagar, 6 p.m.

CULTURE

Shenbaga Tamil Arangu : International Women’s Day celebration, V.Pazhanya speaks, R.Poonguzhali, secretary, Annai Ashram, presides, 102, Gandhi Salai, Srirangam, 6 p.m.

GENERAL

National Institute of Technology Department of Civil Engineering : Moments – symposium, 9 a.m.

Bharathidasan University School of Computer Science Engineering and Applications : Kshaktriya – technical symposium, Khajamalai campus, 10 a.m.

The Booksellers and Publishers Association of South India : Book fair, Corporation grounds, Anna Nagar, Thennur, 11 am. To 9 p.m.

Seethalakshmi Ramaswami College Department of Chemistry: Lecture workshop on recent trends in chemistry, 9.45 a.m.

Shrimathi Indira Gandhi College, Department of Fashion Technology and Costume Designing : Fireless cooking competition, 10.30 a.m.; CSI Women Students Branch and Departments of Computer Science, MCA and IT Applications: Lecture on Opinion Mining by A.Nisha Jebaseeli, Head, Department of Computer Science, Bharathidasan University College, Lalgudi, 2 p.m.

Sri Sivananda Balalaya: Bala Vigyan Utsav, students presentation on ‘Various fields of science in the development of nation,’ D.Gopalakrishnan, assistant professor, Bishop Heber College, speaks on Special theory of relativity, Adavathur campus, 10.30 a.m.

Nehru Memorial College, Puthanampatti : Science Academies lecture workshop on New frontiers in plant sciences and bio technology, 10 a.m.

Entrepreneurship Development Institute of India, Periyar E.V.R.College and Tiruchi District Tiny and Small Scale Industries Association : Entrepreneurship awareness camp, 9.30 a.m.

CARE School of Business Management : ‘Shameless networking start up Trichy,’ Pravin Shekar, speaks, 5 p.m.

Jamal Mohamed College, Department of Tamil: M.Samsudeen endowment lecture by P.Venkatesan, associate professor, Periyar E.V.R.College, 9.30 a.m.; Anti Dowry Association (Women): Release of magazine, ‘Ethiroli,’ S.Sumayaa, principal, Thassim Beevi Abdul Kader College for Women, chief guest, 3 p.m.

M.A.M. College of Engineering and Technology Department of Electrical and Electronics Engineering: Workshop on Industrial automation, M.Akshou, technical coordinator, Zenith Industrial Automation Training Centre, resource person, 9.30 a.m.; Department of Computer Science and Engineering: Inter department symposium, 10 a.m.

Shri Angalamman College of Engineering and Technology National Service Scheme: Blood donation camp, 9.30 a.m.

M.A.M.B. School : Lecture on Logistics Management by Mercy Jenita Vincent, assistant professor, 2 p.m.

Kongunadu College of Engineering and Technology, Tholurpatti : National level conference on Electrical power and energy systems, 10 a.m.

Lakshmi Nursery and Primary School : Annual day, R.Jayalakshmi, Assistant Elementary Education Officer, chief guest, Ariyamangalam, 2 p.m.

Jamal Mohamed College : National seminar on Frontiers in bio sciences, M.Loganathan, Director (incharge), Indian Institute of Crop Processing Technology, inaugurates, 9.30 a.m.

Hallmark Business School: Analysis of Union Budget, 11.30 a.m.
title: tiruchi today
